doc.field: This collection of datasets is provided to the University of Virginia Library's Scholars' Lab by Afghanistan Information Management Services, Islamabad, Pakistan, and is provided AS-IS, with no guarantees in regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. The collection pertains to the administrative areas (boundaries), land use, hydrology, and transportation (roads and airports) of the country of Afghanistan and is intended for educational purposes, general study, and local planning purposes only. The temporal extent of the data collection is from 1990 to 2005. Datasets/layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): *//* *International boundaries of Afghanistan* Provincial boundaries of the 32 Afghanistan provinces * Administrative boundaries of the 329 districts of Afghanistan * Airport and Airfield locations * International airport locations * locations of all basic health facilites (includes type eg: hospital, malaria clinic) * cultivated areas * irrigated areas * lakes * land cover (includes types of land use) * rivers as polyline features * rivers as polygon features (with islands) * roads (includes type) * watershed boundaries (includes size and receiving waterbody) * *//* More detailed descriptions of these datasets can be found via the "Data for download" resource link provided.
